name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerability in a web server to execute commands, pivot to internal systems, and exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--b9c6c418-ce0c-48d8-8e61-4c6f4eec.name: Kill malicious process
action--b9c6c418-ce0c-48d8-8e61-4c6f4eec.description: Terminate the process that executed the malicious script.

action--12f63216-5d63-45f7-b14b-02db0c2e.name: Remove dropped files
action--12f63216-5d63-45f7-b14b-02db0c2e.description: Delete the malicious script dropped on the system.

while-condition--c4c4e6a8-7857-4898-8c95.name: Threat Scan Loop
while-condition--c4c4e6a8-7857-4898-8c95.description: Continuously scan the system for additional threats until none are found.

action--c4c4e6a8-7857-4898-8c95-5f1670c6.name: Scan for additional threats
action--c4c4e6a8-7857-4898-8c95-5f1670c6.description: Run a scan for additional security threats on the system.

threats_found.description: Indicates if additional threats were found during the scan.
